survivalreimagined.weak_hoe: This hoe is too weak to till soil
survivalreimagined.milk_cooldown: This %s's fluid is not yet ready
effect.survivalreimagined.vigour.descrip: Decreases hunger/stamina consumption by 20% per level.
survivalreimagined.no_damage_item: This item blade is not sharp, hits like a fist
survivalreimagined.no_efficiency_item: This item is old and rusty, can't mine anything
survivalreimagined.broken_item: This item is broken, must be repaired
survivalreimagined.crate_weighted: Slows down if %d or more are carried
effect.survivalreimagined.energy_boost.d: Decreases tiredness by 0.2 each second per level.
survivalreimagined:innate_keego_movement: You move faster the more you walk
survivalreimagined:innate_keego_attack: You attack faster the more you walk
survivalreimagined:innate_keego_mine: You mine faster the more you walk
survivalreimagined.cant_forge: Can't Forge, no recipe found or output slot occupied
survivalreimagined.multi_block_structure: Requires a multi block structure to work
survivalreimagined.blast_furnace_invalid: Multi block structure not valid. Must have a bottom layer of Smooth Stone, a middle and top layer of Bricks (top layer can be stairs). The center middle and center top blocks of the 3x3x3 can be anything.
survivalreimagined.soul_blast_furnace_in: Multi block structure not valid. Must have a bottom layer of worked Blackstone, a middle and top layer of Red Nether Bricks (top layer can be stairs). The center middle and center top blocks of the 3x3x3 can be anything.
survivalreimagined.invalid_blast_furnace: This block is not valid. Break and place it back.
item.survivalreimagined.smithing_templat: Add diamond armor, weapon, or tool
survivalreimagined.loose_bed_respawn_poi: Your respawn point is loose, you'll respawn in a radius from your bed.
survivalreimagined.requires_catalyst: Can't activate. The Obelisk requires at least one catalyst block
survivalreimagined.obelisk_disabled: Respawn Obelisk disabled because there are no catalysts left. Your respawn point has been reset
survivalreimagined.fail_respawn_obelisk: You couldn't respawn at the obelisk because it was disabled.
survivalreimagined.decorative_beds: Beds are just a nice decoration. No sleep allowed
survivalreimagined.no_spawn_point: You cannot set a respawn point. Better leave a trace from the world's spawn.
survivalreimagined.enjoy_the_night: Your respawn point has been set. Enjoy the night!
survivalreimagined.no_food_for_sleep: You're too hungry and can't fall asleep
effect.survivalreimagined.tired.descript: Obtained when haven't slept in a while. Reduces movement speed and sight.
survivalreimagined.not_tired: You're not tired enough to sleep
survivalreimagined.too_tired: You should really get some sleep
death.fell.accident.water: %s thought could drop in shallow water safely
survivalreimagined.requires_corners: The portal needs Gold Blocks or Crying Obsidian in the corners to be activated
survivalreimagined.spawner_reactivator: This item can reactivate a Mob Spawner
advancements.sr_story.root.title: Survival Reimagined
advancements.sr_story.root.description: Bringing back Survival in Minecraft since 2023
advancements.sr_story.wooden_pickaxe.des: Obtain your first Wooden Tool. Lasts a lot and it's lightweight to swing, but it's not that good to mine.
advancements.sr_story.wooden_shield.titl: Better than taking a full blow
advancements.sr_story.flint_pickaxe.desc: Obtain your first Flint Tool. Flint can be crafted from Gravel or obtained by ground Flint rocks. Flint tools are slow to attack but can mine quite fast.
advancements.sr_story.stone_pickaxe.desc: Obtain a Stone Pickaxe, and realize that can be used as weapon dealing damage that ignores armor.
advancements.sr_story.upgrade_wooden_shi: Upgrade a wooden shield in the crafting table.
advancements.sr_story.charcoal.title: "Iron" coal
advancements.sr_story.charcoal.descripti: Coal can only be obtained with an Iron pickaxe or higher. Obtain Charcoal by burning logs. A flint in both hands seems to do the job.
advancements.sr_story.campfire.title: Early Game Furnace
advancements.sr_story.furnace.title: A primitive smelter
advancements.sr_story.furnace.descriptio: Obtain a Furnace, the campfire might help smelting the Copper
advancements.sr_story.copper_tools.title: Deeper, Faster, Stronger
advancements.sr_story.copper_tools.descr: Craft a copper tool, which mines faster the deeper you are in the world.
advancements.sr_story.torch.title: Shed some light
advancements.sr_story.torch.description: Obtain a torch, the campfire and some sticks might come in handy
advancements.sr_story.blast_furnace.desc: Obtain a Blast Furnace, then build a 3x3x3 structure to use it. The structure must have Smooth Stone at the bottom + Blast furnace in any of the sides, Bricks in the middle and top layers (stairs also work for the top layer). The middle and middle top block can be empty.
advancements.sr_story.forge.title: Metal equipment anyone?
advancements.sr_story.iron_pickaxe.title: Getting an upgrade
advancements.sr_story.iron_pickaxe.descr: Upgrade a Stone Pickaxe in a Forge
advancements.sr_story.golden_pickaxe.des: Obtain a Gold Pickaxe by upgrading a Flint Pickaxe. You'll feel luck run through your veins .
advancements.sr_story.iron_shield.title: The vanilla shield
advancements.sr_story.iron_shield.descri: Obtain an Iron Shield in a Forge
advancements.sr_story.iron_nugget.title: Small traces in stone
advancements.sr_story.iron_nugget.descri: Obtain an Iron Nugget by mining Stone
advancements.sr_story.chained_copper_arm: Obtain a piece of Chained Copper Armor
advancements.sr_story.durium_ingot.title: Alloying
advancements.sr_story.durium_ingot.descr: Obtain a Durium Ingot by alloying Durium Scrap Block, Clay and Sand in a Blast Furnace
advancements.sr_story.durium_gear.title: Stiffer than iron
advancements.sr_story.durium_gear.descri: Obtain any Durium Gear by upgrading a Iron gear in the Smithing Table
advancements.sr_story.seeds.title: Seedy Business
advancements.sr_story.cleansed_lapis.des: Use a Cleansed Lapis to increase the level of an enchantment by 1
advancements.sr_story.ancient_lapis.desc: Use an Ancient Lapis to increase the level of an enchantment over its maximum
advancements.sr_story.activate_respawn_o: Activate a Respawn Obelisk by placing at least a precious block at the same height and set the respawn point.
advancements.sr_story.crate.title: This is heavy
advancements.sr_story.crate.description: Get a movement speed penalty by transporting more than one Crate.
advancements.sr_story.bucket.title: Moses one block at time
advancements.sr_story.bucket.description: Obtain an Iron Bucket in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.golden_armor.title: Lightweight
advancements.sr_story.golden_armor.descr: Obtain Golden armor. When worn might benefit your speed.
advancements.sr_story.ore_rocks.title: Ore Rocks
advancements.sr_story.ore_rocks.descript: Pick up an Ore rock. These are generated where lots of ores lie underground.
advancements.sr_story.shears.title: Scissors?
advancements.sr_story.iron_armor.title: Suit Up
advancements.sr_story.iron_armor.descrip: Create Iron Armor by upgrading a Chained Copper one in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.explosive_barrel.d: Craft an Explosive Barrel. Warning: explodes easily.
advancements.sr_story.altimeter.title: Ups and downs
advancements.sr_story.altimeter.descript: Craft an Altimeter to roughly know your height. Each layer on the Altimeter represents 32 blocks from Bedrock.
advancements.sr_story.diamond_armor.desc: Equip a full set of diamond armor by upgrading Gold armor in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.firestarter.title: Starting Fires
advancements.sr_story.firestarter.descri: Craft a Firestarter to create fire more consistently.
advancements.sr_story.rich_farmland.desc: Use Bone Meal on Farmland (or on crops while crouching) to create Rich Farmland. Rich farmland makes crops grow faster, but decays after a while.
advancements.sr_story.smoker.title: Smoking hot
advancements.sr_story.smoker.description: Since furnaces are too hot to cook food, a Smoker should do it.
advancements.sr_story.winter_is_coming.d: It's autumn! Make sure to stack up food and wood before Winter as almost nothing grows and animals don't spawn. Also a calendar can help keep track of the season.
advancements.sr_story.fletching_table.ti: §oI shoot my arrows in the air sometimes
advancements.sr_story.fletching_table.de: Make a Fletching table to be able to make more arrows
advancements.sr_story.diamond_arrow.desc: Make Diamond arrows that deal much more damage than base arrows
advancements.sr_story.quartz_arrow.title: White tip
advancements.sr_story.quartz_arrow.descr: Make Quartz arrows that deal more damage than base arrows
advancements.sr_story.torch_arrow.title: Big caves require torching
advancements.sr_story.cloth.title: Give me your dress
advancements.sr_story.bundle.title: That one item
advancements.sr_story.chainmail.title: Forged from fire
advancements.sr_story.chainmail.descript: Obtain a Chainmail piece of armor
advancements.sr_story.solarium.title: Praise the sun
advancements.sr_story.solarium.descripti: Obtain a Solarium Equipment by Smithing Iron with a Solarium Ball
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt.title: Steve the builder
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt.descripti: Obtain a tool belt. Place items in it by right click, equip it with 'V' and open the wheel with 'R'
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt_upgrade.d: Obtain a belt pouch and use an anvil to upgrade the Tool Belt
advancements.sr_story.woodcutter.title: If a stone one exists ...
advancements.sr_story.hard_mode.title: Hard Mode
advancements.sr_story.hard_mode.descript: You've unlocked Hard Mode. Mobs will drop more stuff but have buffed stats.
advancements.sr_story.unfair_oneshot.des: If you get hit for enough damage that would kill you when your health is above 7.5 hearts, that's an unfair one-shot and you're left with half a heart
advancements.sr_story.ensorceller.title: Rolling to enchant
advancements.sr_story.ensorceller.descri: Obtain an Ensorceller, by rolling and using experience you can fill the pool. The higher the pool the higher enchant level. If you bust you lose all your progress. Works best under sunlight.
advancements.sr_story.anvil_fix.title: Fix the fixer
advancements.sr_story.anvil_fix.descript: Repair an anvil with Iron Blocks.
advancements.sr_story.coated_copper_tool: Obtain a Coated Copper tool and electrocute your enemies.
advancements.sr_nether.soul_blast_furnac: Obtain a Soul Blast Furnace, then build a 3x3x3 structure to use it. The structure must have worked Blackstone at the bottom + Soul Blast furnace in any of the sides, Red Nether Bricks in the middle and top layer (stairs also work for the top layer). The middle and middle top block can be empty.
Obtain a Soul Steel Ingot in a Soul Blast Furnace
advancements.sr_nether.keego.title: Stuck in Bedrock
advancements.sr_nether.keego.description: Maybe a blast can pop it out of there
